necessary.name: Alapvető sütik
necessary.description: Ezek a sütik elengedhetetlenek a weboldal megfelelő működéséhez. Alapvető funkciókat tesznek lehetővé, mint az oldalak közötti navigáció és a biztonságos területekhez való hozzáférés. A weboldal nem tud megfelelően működni ezen sütik nélkül.

functional.name: Funkcionális sütik
functional.description: Ezek a sütik megjegyzik az Ön preferenciáit és beállításait, mint például a nyelv választás és a téma, hogy személyre szabottabb élményt nyújtsanak.

analytics.name: Analitikai sütik
analytics.description: Ezek a sütik segítenek megérteni, hogyan használják a látogatók a weboldalunkat anonim információk gyűjtésével és jelentésével. Ez segít javítani a weboldal teljesítményét és felhasználói élményét.

marketing.name: Marketing sütik
marketing.description: Ezeket a sütiket a látogatók webhelyeken keresztüli követésére és személyre szabott hirdetések megjelenítésére használják. Segítenek mérni marketing kampányaink hatékonyságát.

site.name: Keen: Veteran Psychic Marketplace with 2,000+ Advisors
site.tagline: Connect with psychic advisors for love, life path, tarot, and spiritual guidance via phone or chat, 24/7.
site.overview:
Keen is one of the longest-running online psychic platforms, connecting seekers with over 2,000 spiritual advisors since 1999. The marketplace offers diverse services including tarot readings, astrology consultations, love guidance, mediumship, and dream interpretation through phone calls or text chat.

What distinguishes Keen is its extensive advisor network, transparent rating system, and flexible communication options. Users can browse advisors by specialty, read verified reviews, and connect instantly or schedule appointments. The platform maintains complete anonymity for sensitive conversations.

With over 35 million conversations facilitated and 25 years of operation, Keen serves both casual seekers exploring spiritual guidance and dedicated practitioners seeking regular advisor relationships. The 5-minutes-for-$1 introductory offer lowers the barrier for newcomers.

features.name: 2,000+ Psychic Advisors
features.description: Access to a vast network of vetted spiritual advisors covering tarot, astrology, mediumship, love guidance, and more.

features.name: Multiple Communication Channels
features.description: Connect with advisors via phone calls or text chat based on your preference and comfort level.

features.name: Best Match Advisor Quiz
features.description: Personalized questionnaire that matches users with compatible advisors based on emotional state, topic, and desired psychic abilities.

features.name: Transparent Rating System
features.description: Detailed advisor profiles with star ratings, review counts, lifetime transactions, and customer testimonials.

features.name: 24/7 Availability
features.description: Round-the-clock access to advisors across multiple time zones for on-demand spiritual guidance.

features.name: Free Daily Horoscopes
features.description: Daily, monthly, and yearly horoscopes for all 12 zodiac signs with email subscription option.

features.name: Extensive Article Library
features.description: Educational content covering astrology, dreams, tarot, relationships, and spiritual practices with 120+ dream interpretations.

features.name: Keen Rewards Program
features.description: Loyalty program earning points for readings, with bonus points for connecting with new advisors.

features.name: Anonymous Readings
features.description: Complete privacy protection where personal information remains confidential between user and platform.

features.name: Satisfaction Guarantee
features.description: Customer protection policy for readings that do not meet expectations.

features.name: New Advisors Section
features.description: Dedicated page featuring recently joined advisors with 300 bonus reward points for 8+ minute readings.

features.name: Specialized Reading Categories
features.description: Organized services including love readings, financial guidance, pet psychics, dream interpretation, and various astrology traditions.

pros.details: Operating since 1999 with over 35 million conversations facilitated, demonstrating platform stability and trustworthiness.
Over 2,000 advisors across 20+ specializations means users can find practitioners matching specific needs and communication styles.
Per-minute rates displayed upfront with detailed customer reviews, star ratings, and transaction histories for informed decisions.
5-minutes-for-$1 promotional offer allows new users to test advisor compatibility before committing to full rates.
Choice between phone and chat accommodates different comfort levels and situations where voice calls are impractical.
Extensive article library, dream dictionary, and daily horoscopes provide value without requiring paid readings.
Anonymous transactions and confidential conversations address concerns about sensitive topics.

cons.details: Rates range from $1.99 to $19.99 per minute depending on advisor, making cost prediction difficult for extended sessions.
Platform limited to phone and text chat, lacking face-to-face video consultations some users prefer.
With 2,000+ advisors, quality varies significantly; users must rely on reviews to avoid poor experiences.
Platform explicitly states it is 'for entertainment purposes only,' which may undermine credibility for serious seekers.
Help center at help.keen.com blocks direct access (403 errors), requiring users to navigate through the parent company site (ingenio.com) for legal documents.

features: Daily, monthly, and yearly horoscopes for all zodiac signs
Extensive article library with 120+ dream interpretations
freeTier.limitations: No free readings; all advisor consultations require payment

paidPlans.name: New Customer Introductory Offer
features: 5 minutes of reading time with any advisor
Valid for phone or chat consultations

paidPlans.name: Standard Per-Minute Rates
features: Rates range from $1.99 to $19.99 per minute
Price varies by advisor experience and demand

pricing.valueAssessment: Keen's pay-per-minute model offers flexibility but can become expensive for extended consultations. The $1 introductory offer provides genuine value for testing advisors. Compared to competitors, mid-range pricing ($4-8/minute) is competitive, though premium advisors at $15-20/minute approach in-person consultation costs. The Keen Rewards program offsets costs for frequent users.

history.story:
Keen was founded in 1999 by Karl Jacob in San Francisco as a fee-based online advice platform called a "Live Answer Community." The concept originated during the dot-com boom, connecting users with experts via phone consultations. Major early investors included eBay, Microsoft, The Carlyle Group, and Benchmark Capital, with $60 million raised in 2000 and total funding reaching $109 million by year's end—making it the fastest-growing e-commerce company at the time.

In 2002, Karl Jacob was ousted by the board, and the company was renamed Ingenio. It subsequently merged with LiveAdvice and Inforocket. Keen.com evolved into a brand focused specifically on psychic services. AT&T acquired Ingenio in 2007, and Alpine Investors purchased the company in 2013. From 2015-2023, Ingenio expanded through acquisitions of meditation apps and marketplace brands across Europe and North America.

Today, Ingenio operates 20+ global brands across 6 languages, headquartered at 182 Howard Street #826, San Francisco. Current CEO is Laura Walsh. The platform has facilitated over 50 million conversations with over 10 million customer reviews, maintaining 1,600+ vetted advisors who undergo identity verification and screening processes.

primaryUsers: Individuals seeking relationship and love guidance
People exploring spiritual practices and metaphysical topics
Those grieving who want to connect with deceased loved ones
Users seeking career and financial direction
Astrology and tarot enthusiasts wanting personalized readings
targetAudience.idealFor:
Relationship Seekers: The largest advisor category focuses on love and relationships, with 266+ specialists addressing breakups, soulmate questions, and commitment issues.

Spiritual Curious Beginners: The introductory offer, Best Match quiz, and extensive free content lower barriers for newcomers exploring psychic services.

Privacy-Conscious Users: Anonymous transactions and confidential conversations appeal to those discussing sensitive personal matters.

Busy Professionals: 24/7 availability and multiple communication channels accommodate demanding schedules without appointment constraints.

Loyal Repeat Customers: Keen Rewards program and familiar advisors benefit users seeking ongoing spiritual guidance relationships.
targetAudience.notIdealFor:
Budget-Constrained Users: Extended readings at $5-15 per minute accumulate quickly; those seeking lengthy consultations may find costs prohibitive.

Video Communication Preference: Users wanting face-to-face video readings must look elsewhere as Keen only offers phone and text chat.

Evidence-Based Seekers: The 'entertainment purposes only' disclaimer and lack of scientific validation may disappoint those seeking verifiable guidance.

Non-English Speakers: Platform operates exclusively in English with no multilingual support or translated content.

navigation.notes: Clear category hierarchy with multiple pathways to advisors. Primary navigation covers main reading types, while nested menus provide access to specialized services. The Best Match quiz offers an alternative discovery method.

design.notes: Professional teal/green color scheme creates calming atmosphere. Clean typography and balanced white space avoid the cluttered appearance common in spiritual services sites. Material Design principles evident throughout.

mobileExperience.notes: Responsive architecture adapts layouts across viewports. Mobile navigation transforms appropriately. Images resize based on device, indicating mobile-first implementation.

accessibility.notes: Standard form inputs and navigation structure. No obvious accessibility violations, though detailed WCAG compliance testing not performed.

pageSpeed.notes: Content loads progressively. No excessive delays observed, though the advisor-heavy pages contain significant data.

depth.notes: Article content balances accessibility with substance. Dream dictionary provides 120+ interpretations. Astrology articles offer practical guidance without excessive technical jargon.

multimedia.qualityNotes: Advisor photos and category imagery present. Best Match quiz provides interactive element. No video content observed in analyzed pages.

contactability.notes: Phone support at (877) 533-6435 and (800) 275-5336. Privacy inquiries via privacy@ingenio.com. Physical address: 182 Howard Street #826, San Francisco, CA 94105.

legitimacy.notes: Parent company clearly identified with BBB listing. Ingenio operates multiple spiritual brands including Horoscope.com and Astrology.com. TRUSTe licensee for privacy compliance. 26 BBB complaints in 3 years, 6 in past 12 months.

legal.notes: Privacy Policy (effective May 23, 2018) accessible at ingenio.com. User Agreement includes class action waiver and mandatory arbitration. GDPR compliance for EU/UK users with data controller disclosure.

trustCredibility.summary: Keen demonstrates strong legitimacy through 25 years of continuous operation, over 35 million facilitated conversations, and verified company registration at 182 Howard Street, San Francisco. The transparent advisor rating system, satisfaction guarantee, and TRUSTe privacy certification provide consumer protection. The BBB lists 26 closed complaints over 3 years with a "Not Rated" status (outside BBB evaluation scope). The 'entertainment purposes only' disclaimer is standard industry practice.

faq.question: What is Keen and what services does it offer?
faq.answer: Keen is an online psychic marketplace operating since 1999, connecting users with over 2,000 spiritual advisors. Services include tarot readings, astrology consultations, love and relationship guidance, psychic medium sessions, dream interpretation, and financial guidance. Users connect via phone or text chat 24/7.

faq.question: Is Keen free to use?
faq.answer: Keen offers free features including daily horoscopes, extensive articles, and advisor browsing. Readings require payment, but new customers receive 5 minutes for $1 as an introductory offer. Standard rates range from $1.99 to $19.99 per minute depending on the advisor.

faq.question: Is Keen legitimate and trustworthy?
faq.answer: Keen is a legitimate platform operated by Ingenio, LLC, with 25 years of continuous operation and over 35 million conversations facilitated. The platform features verified customer reviews, transparent advisor ratings, and a satisfaction guarantee policy. As with all psychic services, readings are classified as entertainment.

faq.question: How do I find the right psychic advisor on Keen?
faq.answer: Keen offers multiple discovery methods: browse by category (tarot, astrology, love, etc.), use the Best Match quiz for personalized recommendations, filter by ratings and price, or explore the New Advisors section. Each advisor profile displays customer reviews, ratings, and specializations.

faq.question: What is the 5 minutes for $1 offer on Keen?
faq.answer: New Keen customers receive their first 5 minutes of any reading for just $1. This promotional offer applies to both phone and chat consultations with any available advisor, allowing users to test compatibility before committing to standard per-minute rates.

faq.question: Can I get a refund if I'm not satisfied with my Keen reading?
faq.answer: Keen offers a Satisfaction Guarantee policy for readings that do not meet expectations. Users can submit claims through the support system. Specific refund terms and limitations apply based on the nature of the complaint.

faq.question: What types of psychic readings are available on Keen?
faq.answer: Keen offers diverse reading types including tarot card readings, astrology (Western, Vedic, Chinese, Mayan), psychic mediums, love and relationship guidance, dream interpretation, financial guidance, angel readings, aura cleansing, numerology, pet psychics, and feng shui consultations.

faq.question: How much do Keen psychic readings cost?
faq.answer: Keen operates on a pay-per-minute model with rates ranging from $1.99 to $19.99 per minute depending on advisor experience and demand. New customers can try any advisor for $1 for 5 minutes. There are no subscription fees or hidden charges.

faq.question: Is Keen available 24/7?
faq.answer: Yes, Keen operates around the clock with advisors available across multiple time zones. Users can connect instantly with available advisors or schedule appointments with those currently offline. Both phone and chat options are accessible 24/7.

faq.question: How does the Keen Rewards program work?
faq.answer: Keen Rewards is a loyalty program where users earn points for readings. Special promotions include 300 bonus points for connecting with new advisors for 8+ minute readings. Points can be redeemed for reading credits and other benefits.

faq.question: Can I remain anonymous on Keen?
faq.answer: Yes, Keen emphasizes privacy protection. Personal information remains confidential between the user and the platform. Advisors do not receive users' real names or contact details unless voluntarily shared during the reading.

faq.question: Does Keen have a mobile app?
faq.answer: Keen's website is fully responsive and mobile-optimized for smartphone and tablet use. The platform mentions app availability, though consultations are accessible through any mobile browser without requiring a dedicated app installation.

summary.recommendation:
Keen stands as one of the most established online psychic marketplaces, offering genuine value through its extensive advisor network and flexible communication options. The platform successfully balances accessibility for newcomers with depth for experienced spiritual seekers.

Users seeking relationship guidance, spiritual exploration, or connection with deceased loved ones will find Keen's 2,000+ advisors well-equipped to address diverse needs. The 5-minutes-for-$1 introductory offer, Best Match quiz, and transparent review system minimize risk for first-time users. The free horoscope and article content provides ongoing value without requiring paid readings.

However, those with tight budgets should approach cautiously, as extended readings can accumulate significant costs. Users preferring video consultations or non-English services must look elsewhere. The entertainment disclaimer, while legally standard, may concern seekers wanting more than personal guidance.

At 7.8/10, Keen earns a "Very Good" rating for delivering reliable, accessible psychic services with strong trust indicators. The platform's longevity and scale provide confidence that users will find suitable advisors, though individual reading quality depends heavily on advisor selection.

callToAction.ctaDescription: Try Keen's psychic advisors with a low-risk introductory offer and discover spiritual guidance tailored to your needs.
